body:
I'm looking for a book or any other resource that will help me learn how to create RESTful APIs in Java. 
Looking on Amazon, I saw that there are [several solutions for RESTful Java](http://www.amazon.com/s?tag=ronin-20&index=blended&field-keywords=restful%20java), but I'm looking for the one that is tailored to a novice.

Looking forward to getting your advices/opinions, thanks!
title: What's the best source for learning how to create RESTful APIs in Java?
